channel.title: Ice barrage not stopping npcs?
channel.description: ice barrage is working with damage + stopping players in pvp, but whenever i use it on npcs it only hurts them + shows ice, but not stopping them :S delta 317! :D thanks in advance if you know what to do. :)

item.title: Ice barrage not stopping npcs?
item.dc:creator: @Medizine Medizine
item.description:
@Medizine wrote:

you have to add a freeze timer.

NPCHandler.java and search for

        npcs[NPCID].RandomWalk = false;

right under it add this:

    if((npcs[NPCID].npcType != 2745 && npcs[NPCID].npcType != 3777 && npcs[NPCID].npcType != 3778 && npcs[NPCID].npcType != 3779 && npcs[NPCID].npcType != 3780 ) && npcs[NPCID].Frozentimer == 0) {//R

once again search for

        npcs[NPCID].RandomWalk = false;

and under that one also put

   if((npcs[NPCID].npcType != 2745 && npcs[NPCID].npcType != 3777 && npcs[NPCID].npcType != 3778 && npcs[NPCID].npcType != 3779 && npcs[NPCID].npcType != 3780 ) && npcs[NPCID].Frozentimer == 0) {//U

after that search for:

for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) { if (npcs[i] != null) { if (npcs[i].actionTimer > 0) { npcs[i].actionTimer--; }
right under it add this:

if (npcs[i].Frozentimer > 0) { npcs[i].Frozentimer--;//K }

now save your npchandler and exit out
next open up your NPC.java and search for

	public boolean RandomWalk;

directly under it add

	public int Frozentimer = 0;//IA

save that and exit that

now to make it to were the spells freeze, open up your client.java search for magic on npc
then search for , ice rush, ice burst, ice blitz, and ice barrage
under each of those spells you should see something like this

if(magicID == 12891) {// ice barrage if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(366, absY, absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((52*hitDiff), playerMagic); setAnimation(1979); } else { sendMessage("You do need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell"); } }
under the

teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY;
add

			server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].Frozentimer = #;

under each of the ice spells and there u have it save and compile and enjoy
also were the # is change that to the number of seconds u want the spell to hold the npc so if u want 20 sec replace # with 20 rep me and happy holidats

Read full topic
